form.label: Troubleshooting Index Configuration
form.searchTemplate: | rest /services/data/indexes count=0 | search disabled=0 | stats `values_or_list($choice$, maxTotalDataSizeMB)` AS maxTotalDataSizeMB, mode(maxTotalDataSizeMB) AS pop_max, `values_or_list($choice$, homePath.maxDataSizeMB)` AS home_max, mode(homePath.maxDataSizeMB) AS pop_home, `values_or_list($choice$, coldPath.maxDataSizeMB)` AS cold_max, mode(coldPath.maxDataSizeMB) AS pop_cold, `values_or_list($choice$, coldPath_expanded)` AS cold_paths, `values_or_list($choice$, homePath_expanded)` AS home_paths, `values_or_list($choice$, repFactor)` AS repFactor, `values_or_list($choice$, splunk_server)` AS indexers, dc(splunk_server) AS idx_count by title | eventstats max(idx_count) AS all_idx_all_server

html.div:
Occasionally, when managing multiple indexers (particularly if doing so manually) it's possible for transcription errors to creep in when setting up indexes. This dashboard attempts to highlight those misconfiguration issues.
The values for a each of a collection of configuration knobs are collected, and compared to one another. When there are discrepancies, the values of each are shown in the table. Typically, there should be only one value for each of the size-based configuration options. The list of "Indexers w/ This Index" should include the search head, and all of the search peers.

single.title: Number of "Missing" Indexes
single.searchPostProcess: | where idx_count < all_idx_all_server | stats dc(title) AS missing | rangemap field=missing foo=0-0 default=severe

single.title: Number of Indexes with Mis-Matched Size
single.searchPostProcess: where mvcount(mvdedup(maxTotalDataSizeMB)) > 1 | stats dc(title) AS mismatch | rangemap field=mismatch foo=0-0 default=severe

table.title: Index Configuration Summary
table.searchPostProcess: table title, repFactor, indexers, maxTotalDataSizeMB, pop_max, home_max, pop_home, cold_max, pop_cold, cold_paths, home_paths, all_idx_all_server | rename title AS Index, pop_max AS "Common Max Size(s)" repFactor AS "Rep. Factor", pop_home AS "Common Home Size(s)", pop_cold AS "Common Cold Size(s)", indexers AS "Indexers w/ this Index" all_idx_all_server AS "Target Count" | `_fb_index_configs_renames_list_only($choice$)`
